headline: Kinitics Automation Wins $100,000 Grant Award from Rose Rock Bridge to Accelerate U.S. Market Expansion for the KVA38 Valve Actuator
summary: Kinitics Automation Inc., a leading innovator in advanced motion control solutions using shape memory alloy (SMA) technology, has been awarded a $100,000 grant from Rose Rock Bridge. The program, backed by regional commercial partners Devon Energy, Williams, ONEOK, and H&P, creates a platform for collaborative innovation between technology companies and established operators.
